components/f/animations/aos: {{#if theme_settings.enable_animations}} data-aos="{{#if effect}}{{effect}}{{else}}fade-up{{/if}}"{{#if offset}} data-aos-offset="{{offset}}"{{/if}}{{#if duration}} data-aos-duration="{{duration}}"{{else}} data-aos-duration="300"{{/if}}{{#if easing}} data-aos-easing="{{easing}}"{{/if}}{{#if delay}} data-aos-delay="{{delay}}"{{/if}}{{#if anchor}} data-aos-anchor="{{anchor}}"{{/if}}{{#if anchor_placement}} data-aos-anchor-placement="{{anchor_placement}}"{{/if}}{{#if once}} data-aos-once="{{once}}"{{/if}}{{/if}}

{{#if heading}}{{{heading}}}{{/if}} {{#if text}}

{{{text}}}
